title: When the Soraka goes to gank your lane...

replies.body: I still wonder when they are going to create Nurse Soraka {{champion:16}} . Imagine her staff (when her passive triggers) making ambulance noises.
Her taunt should have something about a ride on the waaambulance
Riot Soraka, shared line with Riot Graves n Kayle.
http://i.imgur.com/gLf3O64.png

How to buff soraka:

Add sion ult with hospital sirens. It would heal allies when it collides
Is that an oombulance? :O

Then you switch to AD.

https://pics.me.me/ad-soraka-when-soraka-goes-ad-3667929.png https://images-cdn.9gag.com/photo/aRV5yjA_700b.jpg https://i.ytimg.com/vi/emUQSITvuVE/maxresdefault.jpg

https://orig00.deviantart.net/cfd4/f/2012/163/6/a/ad_soraka___by_ms05zaku-d5399wf.jpg https://res.cloudinary.com/teepublic/image/private/s--dZ4LKpTS--/t_Preview/b_rgb:5e366e,c_limit,f_jpg,h_630,q_90,w_630/v1470759240/production/designs/624486_1.jpg

Always remember, 
https://68.media.tumblr.com/be3a89e90414da65926673d7982ba713/tumblr_ol9gpkN7Hh1v3ckk2o1_1280.jpg

(inhales) 

CRUISING ON DOWN MAIN STREET YOUR RELAXED AND FEELING GOOD!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b8HO6hba9ZE
That's not even the right sh-, you know what never mind
Full AP raka with celerity.... your pain is my damage.
http://i.imgur.com/5yMMim5.jpg?nodirect

A Nurse Soraka skin sure would be nice. 

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/utvrOwJGQ8g/maxresdefault.jpg

Hopefully she won't be out of her element.

https://pre00.deviantart.net/c0af/th/pre/i/2016/068/f/7/nurse_soraka_by_migerumaru-d9uiqcv.jpg

Not _too_ much into it would be preferably also.

https://scontent-atl3-1.cdninstagram.com/vp/be0406b5a3fdd4e2b5c36290f1cf5b89/5BC9EB52/t51.2885-15/e35/29415930_1996754937242059_5899445624700403712_n.jpg

We need it just right.

https://pre00.deviantart.net/9a78/th/pre/i/2017/206/2/3/nurse_soraka_by_sinflorax-dbhosqq.png https://pre00.deviantart.net/a06c/th/pre/i/2015/282/e/a/nurse_soraka_by_mysteriouspancake-d9chg1e.jpg 

...Especially considering we lost the other one.

https://pm1.narvii.com/6597/33b8b59467d24502e0d8f8c95c914e90e6d94d47_hq.jpg 
-> https://static.bonusstage.com.mx/uploads/2018/07/nurse-splash-min.jpg

That said, there is always "that guy":

https://pre00.deviantart.net/143b/th/pre/i/2015/057/f/7/aram_adventures__un_healthy_relationship_by_farahboom-d8jm2cl.jpg

However, I think...

http://www.lol-wallpapers.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/Nurse-Akali-by-Dweynie-League-of-Legends-Artwork-Wallpaper-lol.jpg https://img.fireden.net/v/image/1531/78/1531780889813.jpg

I mean, I miss...

https://i.imgur.com/jdrarx4.jpg http://www.lol-wallpapers.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/nurse_akali__meganekko__by-CLeRu087-League-of-Legends-Artwork-Wallpaper-lol.jpg

I'm sorry, I just found 2 big distractions here. What were we talking about again?

...Ah, yes - https://pro2-bar-s3-cdn-cf2.myportfolio.com/c6a8a1eba03740a28358639de4c567fe/ddb75bab-f65a-445e-ab4f-ace29593fbeb_rwc_0x23x602x472x602.png?h=ea37a9b7d762baa2b83bfba0ced165ae

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Gxt3fV8g,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-09-17T16:46:55.646+0000)
>
> 
> That said, there is always "that guy":
> 
> https://pre00.deviantart.net/143b/th/pre/i/2015/057/f/7/aram_adventures__un_healthy_relationship_by_farahboom-d8jm2cl.jpg

Oh... That last panel is Soraka kicking him in the face... I thought it was something completely different at first x_x

Dude, under the circumstances portrayed above, don't you think facesitting would be an awkward solution? ^^

_I'm starting to think I added too many images above - the "story" seems to be left unnoticed._

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Gxt3fV8g,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2018-09-17T22:44:54.975+0000)
>
> Dude, under the circumstances portrayed above, don't you think facesitting would be an awkward solution? ^^
> 
> _I'm starting to think I added too many images above - the "story" seems to be left unnoticed._

Indeed it would be, so I was confused as to how it played out to that outcome when I thought that's what it was XD

_Also, I noticed the narrative you were playing out. It was quite amusing :P It's just there was that one comic that threw me off lol_

You like comics like that, check out "ARAM Adventures" on DeviantArt. 
You may have to do some digging, as the immediate DeviantArt folder is very limited. I got 140+ items in that series locally stored.
_I could upload them to my Onedrive, if you are interested._

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/1fcee07fb76a23a9d704597a88643843.jpg

Also, check the "other" work (academic research reference applies) of the same artist.

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

I hate it when a Soraka shows up mid to heal your enemy after you pumped out a bunch of damage.

Fortunately last time she did that I used ignite and burst them right in that Soraka's face.  That felt good.
thats not nice
I'm not usually nice to my opponent (except in chat haha)
Wait did they finally fix the passive?  Super adorable.
The BANANBULANCE!
implying they care aboit anyone but the adc
